io.gearpump.streaming.partitioner

Class CoLocationPartitioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.streaming.partitioner.CoLocationPartitioner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Partitioner, UnicastPartitioner, java.io.Serializable

    public class CoLocationPartitioner
extends java.lang.Object
implements UnicastPartitioner
    Will have the same parallelism with last processor And each task in current processor will co-locate with task of last processor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPartition

        public int getPartition(Message msg,
                        int partitionNum,
                        int currentPartitionId)
        Description copied from interface: UnicastPartitioner
        Gets the SINGLE downstream processor task index to send message to.

        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface UnicastPartitioner
        Parameters:
        msg - Message you want to send
        partitionNum - How many tasks does the downstream processor have.
        currentPartitionId - Upstream task's task index who trigger the getPartition() call.

        Returns:
        ONE task index of downstream processor.
